EmailTemplate.name: 21Feb13Web:SuperConnecting.Invite 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: Learn 3 Tips for Superconnecting
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}},
We would like to remind you that on February 21 at 1 p.m. ET, we will hold a webinar entitled "Three Expert Tips for Superconnecting: How to Build the Relationships That Build Business <http://info.mbopartners.com/21Feb13WebSuperConnecting_RegistrationPage.html>."
Our expert guest this month is Judy Robinett, a former corporate CEO, funding guru and entreprenuer who developed a new style of networking that's been referred to as "superconnecting." Judy's creative technique will teach you how to connect with the right people in the right ways to take your business to the next level.
Register today <http://info.mbopartners.com/21Feb13WebSuperConnecting_RegistrationPage.html> to revolutionize your independent business in 2013. ___________________________________ MBO Partners t: 1-800-220-0469 e: info@mbopartners.com
